column4: I was looking at "linux laptops" like laptops sold with linux and they were like 4 grand US, I couldn't believe it
I believe Ubuntu has a laptop program with HP laptops. Find out which model and check the HP site :-)
(Mine's an nx9005, which runs Ubuntu just dandy  -it IS about 3 years old, though)
You don't like the Linux tax?
i guess it's only fair, since i don't pay for the software :)
I don't have it, and I'm running Hoary
sorry, I do have it after all
nah, there, I just had them sorted differently
but !find apt-setup doesn't work for me
oh, I thought you were talking about something else
that hints very much at bed time very shortly
